\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Statistics of current memory usage and available budget, in bytes, for specific memory heap. 

\doxysubsection{Member Data Documentation}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{structVmaBudget_a7e2a6583ebd63e194951c542563804d8}\label{structVmaBudget_a7e2a6583ebd63e194951c542563804d8}} 
\index{VmaBudget@{VmaBudget}!allocationBytes@{allocationBytes}}
\index{allocationBytes@{allocationBytes}!VmaBudget@{VmaBudget}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{allocationBytes}{allocationBytes}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily Vk\+Device\+Size Vma\+Budget\+::allocation\+Bytes}



Sum size of all allocations created in particular heap, in bytes. 

Usually less or equal than {\ttfamily block\+Bytes}. Difference {\ttfamily block\+Bytes -\/ allocation\+Bytes} is the amount of memory allocated but unused -\/ available for new allocations or wasted due to fragmentation.

It might be greater than {\ttfamily block\+Bytes} if there are some allocations in lost state, as they account to this value as well. \mbox{\Hypertarget{structVmaBudget_ab82e1d1754c2d210d0bdf90220bc6cdd}\label{structVmaBudget_ab82e1d1754c2d210d0bdf90220bc6cdd}} 
\index{VmaBudget@{VmaBudget}!budget@{budget}}
\index{budget@{budget}!VmaBudget@{VmaBudget}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{budget}{budget}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily Vk\+Device\+Size Vma\+Budget\+::budget}



Estimated amount of memory available to the program, in bytes. 

Fetched from system using {\ttfamily VK\+\_\+\+EXT\+\_\+memory\+\_\+budget} extension if enabled.

It might be different (most probably smaller) than {\ttfamily Vk\+Memory\+Heap\+::size\mbox{[}heap\+Index\mbox{]}} due to factors external to the program, like other programs also consuming system resources. Difference {\ttfamily budget -\/ usage} is the amount of additional memory that can probably be allocated without problems. Exceeding the budget may result in various problems. \mbox{\Hypertarget{structVmaBudget_a84dd1ecca8b0110259eb206dbadb11f6}\label{structVmaBudget_a84dd1ecca8b0110259eb206dbadb11f6}} 
\index{VmaBudget@{VmaBudget}!usage@{usage}}
\index{usage@{usage}!VmaBudget@{VmaBudget}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{usage}{usage}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily Vk\+Device\+Size Vma\+Budget\+::usage}



Estimated current memory usage of the program, in bytes. 

Fetched from system using {\ttfamily VK\+\_\+\+EXT\+\_\+memory\+\_\+budget} extension if enabled.

It might be different than {\ttfamily block\+Bytes} (usually higher) due to additional implicit objects also occupying the memory, like swapchain, pipelines, descriptor heaps, command buffers, or {\ttfamily Vk\+Device\+Memory} blocks allocated outside of this library, if any.
